p.s: The novel Gun Love, written by Jennifer Clement and published in 2019, deals with Pearl, a girl who lives together with her mother in a car.
Her mom gave birth to her when she was only seventeen and had to run away from her home because of her fear that her abusive father could harm her or her newborn child.
When Pearl is 14, her mother gets shootshot and she comes in a foster home where she lives together with two other foster children: Leo and Helen.
Helen is a very small, eight year old girl.
She is a typicalltypical foster child: she had nearly 20 different homes, nobody really looks after her.
Sha has for example at least 17 phones from her past homes.
They said that she should stay in touch with them, but she cannot remember which phone belongs to which house.
Helen does not know who she is and where she comes from.
That is why, she invents lots of families for herself and best friends she has to call.
In her current foster home, she has Leo and Pearl, who are nice to her.
Because of the lots of bad things she has gone through, she talkestalks all the time, asks questions and talks from herself in the third person.
She dreams from good things and searches all the time for love.
